sentences.en: A weasel ran off with a chick in its mouth.
Chandler's weasel face framed innocent eyes.
sentences.cn: 钱德勒狡猾的脸上露出一副若无其事的神情.

sentences.en: Chandler's weasel face screwed into an obsequious smile.
sentences.cn: 钱德勒黄鼠狼似的脸上现出了谄媚的笑容.

sentences.en: Fox, badger, weasel and stoat are regularly seen here.
sentences.cn: 狐狸、獾、黄鼠狼和白鼬在这里很常见。

sentences.en: He might be a bore, but he was as quick-witted as a weasel.
sentences.cn: 他也许是个很无聊的人，可是却像黄鼠狼一样机灵。

sentences.en: He's trying to figure out a way to weasel out of the deal.
sentences.cn: 他正设法逃避根据协议应承担的义务.

sentences.en: Herbie had bared his weasel teeth.
sentences.cn: 赫比露出了黄鼠狼般的牙齿.

sentences.en: It was a good " weasel word. "
sentences.cn: 这是个典型的 " 难以捉摸的字眼 ".

sentences.en: The police report was filled with weasel words.
sentences.cn: 警察的报告书里充满推托之辞.

sentences.en: The weasel goes to pay his respects to the hen -- not with the best of intentions.
sentences.cn: 黄鼠狼给鸡 拜年,没安好心.

sentences.en: The weasel is a very pretty little creature.
sentences.cn: 黄鼬是一种很可爱的小动物.

sentences.en: They set a trap for the weasel.
sentences.cn: 他们给黄鼠狼设下陷阱.

sentences.en: They tried to weasel out of the predicament.
sentences.cn: 他门试图摆脱这种困境.

sentences.en: What I did was wrong and I should be punished. I'm not going to try and weasel out.
sentences.cn: 我错了,应受惩罚.我不会设法逃避的.

sentences.en: When the weasel and the cat make a marriage , it is a very ill presage.
sentences.cn: 黄鼠狼和猫成亲, 不是好兆头.

phrases.tran_cn: 乘精明细心的人麻痹不备欺骗他
逃脱，推诿：以一种狡黠或懦怯的方式脱离某种境况或推诿责任

trans.tran_cn: 鼬鼠，黄鼠狼，狡猾的人，卑劣的人
trans.tran_en: a small thin furry animal that kills and eats rats and birds
